name: Taponomicon
description:
Ever wanted to gather a horde of creatures that will follow your every command? Consort with dark forces and TAP to summon your minions!

Unlock the ultimate secrets of the universe… or destroy it in the process.
Welcome to TAPONOMICON!

Game Features:

- TAP to open portals and summon your dark minions from beyond!
- MERGE creatures to into new, unknown beings that will increase your wisdom!
- Explore hidden worlds of the MYTHOS!
- Use game-changing spells to your advantage!
- ASCEND the leaderboards and exchange gifts with those you'd call friends!
